Made with love by Montique Stevens with Eleventy, a dash of my custom coded HTML/CSS/JS and a sprinkle of Font Awesome for the icons. NodeJS provides the modules necessary for my blog. TailwindCSS is used for additional styling. The fonts for Body and Header use IBM Plex Mono, courtesy of Google Fonts. Copyright 2019-2021©
